author: cnbc.com
title: Chimera Investment Corporation Announces Date of First Quarter 2018 Financial and Conference Call
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Chimera Investment Corporation (NYSE:CIM) (the "Company") announced today that it plans to release its financial results for the first quarter 2018 on Thursday, May 3, 2018 prior to 7:00 a.m. EDT. The Company will conduct a conference call and audio webcast to discuss the results on Thursday, May 3, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. EDT.
Call-in Number: U.S. Toll Free (866) 643-4456 International (703) 546-4241 Conference ID 6395379 Webcast http://www.chimerareit.com/investors/events/events-and-presentations/events-calendar
A replay of the call will be available for one week following the conference call. Conference Call Replay: U.S. Toll Free (800) 585-8367 International (404) 537-3406 Conference ID 6395379 If you would like to be added to the e-mail distribution list, please visit www.chimerareit.com , click on Investor Relations, then select Email Alerts and complete the email notification form.
About Chimera Investment Corporation
Chimera Investment Corporation is a publicly traded real estate investment trust, or REIT, that is primarily engaged in the business of investing directly or indirectly through our subsidiaries, on a leveraged basis, in a diversified portfolio of mortgage assets, including residential mortgage loans, Non-Agency RMBS, Agency CMBS, Agency RMBS, and other real estate related securities.
Please visit www.chimerareit.com and click on Investor Relations for additional information about the Company.
